title: India Post Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for 100 Assistant Postal Trainee Posts
description: The India Post Office has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for 100 Assistant Postal Trainee Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass can grab this chance and apply for the India Post Recruitment 2025 . Here we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online through the website on or before the last date of ...
